name: Untitled Slime Platformer
description:
An Untitled Slime Platformer

Play as a slime, on an adventure of a lifetime. Far from home, you must help the other slimefolk across the world. Travel to interesting new biomes, learn the arts of platforming from the skillful slimes while defeating the enemies that get in your way.

This is a solo project that I started recently. Everything in the game has been created by me. Will hopefully turn into something great.
